game.name: Ghost Sector
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Ghost Sector is a survival horror game where you play as M-07, a prototype machine trapped in a cybernetic facility during lockdown. Outwit the automated defenses, search for answers uncovering secrets, solving puzzles, and upgrade your abilities while preserving your finite energy.
